definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: test, trial, proving;—´[[מ]] Ps 95:8; cstr. [[מַסַּת]] Job 9:23; pl. [[מַסּׂת]] De 4:34, De 7:19, [[מַסּוֹת]] De 29:2; —testingsor provings of Pharaoh and Egyptians at Exodus, De 4:34 (v. Dr), De 7:19, De 29:2 (‖[[אׂתׂת]]);—test, trial, of innocent person Job 9:23 acc. to Hi al., but v. I. [[מַסָּה]] sub [[מסס]].
